title: The Power of mentoring
brief_description: Mentoring is where an experienced individual invests time, energy and personal knowledge to assist another person. This management title discusses successful mentoring behaviours and follows two main mentoring relationships and their development. Also shown is a mentoring situation which isn’t working, demonstrating that mentoring requires an equal input from both partners. A 51 page training program accompanies this title.
